desc: Sippin' cocktail mixes are fuss-free, affordable, delicious mixers that'll stir up your spirits! Make cocktails and mocktails at home within seconds- just snip, pour and #getsippin! Our flavors include- Mojito, Cosmopolitan, Orange Cinnamon, Sangria, Pina Colada, Spicy Guava, Lychee Lime and Watermelon Lemongrass
